Token.Abstract: The methods in the NSObject (SLAccessibilityDescription) category allow developers to examine the accessibility properties of objects within their application, for use in making their application accessible to disabled users and to Subliminal.
Returns a string that describes the receiver in terms of its accessibility properties.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string that describes the receiver in terms of its accessibility properties.

Token.Abstract: Returns a string that recursively describes accessibility elements contained within the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string that recursively describes the receiver and its accessibility children in terms of their accessibility properties.
